Class User

java.lang.Object
users.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminUser, BusinessUser, CustomerUser
public abstract class User extends Object
Abstract class representing a user. This class contains common attributes and methods that all user types (e.g., customer, business, admin) share. The password is hashed and can be validated. Users can also have multiple addresses.
Author:
24862664

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      User(String firstname, String lastName, String emailAddress, String username, String password)
      Constructs a User with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      firstname - The first name of the user.
      lastName - The last name of the user.
      emailAddress - The email address of the user.
      username - The username of the user.
      password - The password of the user (will be hashed).

    • getTelephoneNum

      public String getTelephoneNum()
      Retrieves the user's telephone number.
      Returns:
      The user's telephone number.

    • setTelephoneNum

      public void setTelephoneNum(String number)
      Sets the user's telephone number. The number must be 11 digits.
      Parameters:
      number - The telephone number to set.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the telephone number is invalid.

    • addAddress

      public void addAddress(Address address)
      Adds an address to the user's address list.
      Parameters:
      address - The address to add.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the address is null.

    • getAddresses

      public ArrayList<Address> getAddresses()
      Retrieves a list of the user's addresses.
      Returns:
      A list of addresses associated with the user.

    • removeAddress

      public void removeAddress(Address address)
      Removes an address from the user's address list.
      Parameters:
      address - The address to remove.

    • getPassword

      public String getPassword()
      Retrieves the user's password (hashed).
      Returns:
      The hashed password.

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword(String password)
      Sets a new password for the user and hashes it.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to set.

    • validatePassword

      public boolean validatePassword(String inputPassword)
      Validates if the provided password matches the user's stored password.
      Parameters:
      inputPassword - The input password to validate.
      Returns:
      True if the passwords match, otherwise false.

    • hashPassword

      public String hashPassword(String password)
      Hashes the provided password using the SHA-256 algorithm.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to hash.
      Returns:
      The hashed password as a hexadecimal string.

    • getBusinessName

      public String getBusinessName()

    • setBusinessName

      public void setBusinessName(String businessName)

    • getRole

      public abstract String getRole()
      Returns the role of the user. Subclasses must implement this method.
      Returns:
      The role of the user (e.g., "customer", "admin", "business").
